p: Initial findings of different clinical trials are important first steps to develop efficient treatment against COVID-19. 41 Beigel et al 32 published a randomized, placebo-controlled, multicenter study on remdesivir efficacy against SARS-CoV-2. The report is significant since it is the first report on the efficacy of remdesivir against a novel coronavirus with unknown pathogenesis. 41 Results showed that remdesivir has a moderate clinical efficacy against COVID-19. 32 Findings were preliminary and are followed by more collected data and a full statistical study by all education people. 41
